titlestmt.titleproper: Ford Foundation records, International Affairs Program
A Guide to the Ford Foundation records, International Affairs Program FA1687

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-01-01 04:03:21 -0500.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Ford Foundation records, International Affairs Program

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Records more than 10 years old are open for research, unless otherwise noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Consists primarily of program files, office files, and correspondence.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in collections by file type or originating officer. Additional finding aids are created as records are processed and open for research.
